text: Asaf "Assi" Dayan (23 November 1945 - 1 May 2014) was an Israeli movie director, actor, screenwriter and producer. By 2008, he had acted in over 50 movies and television series episodes. He was born in Nahalal. Dayan died on 1 May 2014 in Tel Aviv. He was 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Israeli businesspeople Category:Jewish actors Category:Movie directors from Tel Aviv Category:Israeli screenwriters Category:Israeli movie actors Category:Israeli movie directors Category:Israeli movie producers Category:Actors from Tel Aviv Category:Israeli television actors
title: Assi Dayan
